CustomField.description: The percent of this roles salary that NYSERDA will reimburse for. Used by WFD.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Refer to PON 3982 Reimbursement Details for guidance on applicable reimbursement percentage. https://www.nyserda.ny.gov/All-Programs/Programs/Clean-Energy-Workforce-Development/On-the-job-training
CustomField.label: Reimbursement Percent
